description: Task instance object representing a single execution instance of a task within a DAG run

task_id.description: Unique identifier for the task within the DAG

dag_id.description: The DAG ID this task instance belongs to

dag_run_id.description: The DAG run ID this task instance belongs to

run_id.description: Run ID for the DAG run

state.description: Current state of the task instance

execution_date.description: Logical execution date of the task instance

duration.description: Duration of the task instance in seconds

queued_dttm.description: When the task instance was queued

pid.description: Process ID of the task instance

hostname.description: Hostname where the task instance is running

pool.description: Pool name the task instance is assigned to

pool_slots.description: Number of pool slots used by the task instance

queue.description: Queue name the task instance is assigned to

priority_weight.description: Priority weight of the task instance

task_group.description: Task group the task belongs to

max_tries.description: Maximum number of retries for the task

try_number.description: Current try number for the task instance

job_id.description: Job ID of the task instance

external_executor_id.description: External executor ID for the task instance

logical_date.description: Logical date of the task instance (same as execution_date)

data_interval_start.description: Start of the data interval for this task instance

data_interval_end.description: End of the data interval for this task instance

rendered_fields.description: Rendered fields for the task instance

rendered_map_index.description: Rendered map index for the task instance

map_index.description: Map index for the task instance

note.description: Note attached to the task instance
